title: $2700 - 2 bed / bath /1500 sq ft / sun drenched / parking incl
posting_body: 1500 sq ft sun drenched 2 bed 2 bath condo with reserved gated parking and back porch in an ideal location.
100 ft walk to Lake Shore Dr buses and 7 minute walk to Wilson Red Line, Target, Aldi and Jewel.
1 block from Peter Rubi Organic plant based market, Good Vets Veterinarian and 3 blocks from The Reservoir, an up-scale bar with great food and drink specials!
Also, 3 blocks from Montrose beach and dog beach, Wilson track, Cricket Hill and lake front path.
Across the street from Clarendon Park, which has a basketball court, tennis courts, baseball field, a playground with play-in fountain and a dog park.
Condo is in immaculate condition with a newly renovated and unused ensuite master bathroom!
In-unit stacked washer dryer are state-of-the-art, wi-fi enabled, and brand new.
French door refrigerator also brand new.
Handmade maple shelves in kitchen provide additional open storage.

Open kitchen to dining/living room make a great space for entertaining, while the spacious and sunlit front room with working fireplace offers additional living area or office with a view for those working from home.
Walk-in closets in both bedrooms newly outfitted with modular closet organization system from IKEA that can be easily added to.
Nest thermostat included for convenient control of AC and heat.
Back porch is shared with friendly neighbors.
Additional storage in basement available upon request.
Other attractions in the area include Argyle Vietnamese town, The Riviera, The Aragon Ballroom, Green Mill Tavern, First Ascent Climbing Gym, Boystown and Wrigley Field, Golf Course
